pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Linear Mixed Model Trees // Recursive partitioning based on (generalized) linear mixed models (GLMMs) combining lmer()/glmer() from 'lme4' and lmtree()/glmtree() from 'partykit'. The fitting algorithm is described in more detail in Fokkema, Smits, Zeileis, Hothorn Kelderman (2018; DOI:10.3758/s13428-017-0971-x).
